channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- ThinkPad X1 Fold Gen 1
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- ThinkPad X1 Fold Gen 1

item.title: CVE-2022-4573|2024-08-03T01:41:45.808Z -- lenovo -- thinkpad%20x1%20fold%20gen%201
item.description: An SMI handler input validation vulnerability in the ThinkPad X1 Fold Gen 1 could allow an attacker with local access and elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code.
